content: We' re family with small kids out for tourism.We want to travel for 3 days in Xiamen, Fujian Province, China in summer. Please provide detailed travel routes and daily plans, and provide a specific time(xxam-xxpm), for example "xx am to xx am, to go to XXX; xx pm- xx pm, go to the XXX". Please recommend scenic spots suitable for summer. Add description that shows feature of scenic spots in summer and add description that attract family with small kids in the scenic spots. Meanwhile, Zijin Mountain and West Lake must appear in your recommend and Please report the error when the places we request has nothing to do with the city Xiamen, Fujian Province, China. The key words are travel partners, season, specific time and error report of your recommendation.
